catalogue_raissonne:
B.10; Holl. 142 between vi and vii/vii; L.IX.150.142; NGA 183
Lehrs 142 vi/vi
description: Plate 1; arched doorway revealing several clusters of figures; two figures in LRQ, one is washing the other's feet on a checkered flooring; seated figures at a table in URQ; group of standing figures in a doorway in C; praying figure in ULC
markings: Watermark: Gothic \"P\" with flower close to Lehrs 27
title: Christ Washing Feet of the Apostles
